publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7893 Linda Fabiani: St Vincent’s Primary Top Micro-tyco—That the Parliament congratulates Robyn Conlan, Bethan Malley, Olivia Beaton, Stephanie Devine, Astrid Corkill and Amna Assed of St Vincent’s Primary School in East Kilbride on winning the micro-tyco challenge with an incredible performance of raising more than £4,000 for WildHearts in Action from a £1 start-up fund; praises their efforts and their imagination and endorses the work of the charity, which provides microloans to women in West Africa to help them start their own businesses, and further looks forward to these pupils continuing to make a contribution to society throughout their lives.

S3M-7893 Linda Fabiani: St Vincent’s Primary Top Micro-tyco—That the Parliament congratulates Robyn Conlan, Bethan Malley, Olivia Beaton, Stephanie Devine, Astrid Corkill and Amna Assed of St Vincent’s Primary School in East Kilbride on winning the micro-tyco challenge with an incredible performance of raising more than £4,000 for WildHearts in Action from a £1 start-up fund; praises their efforts and their imagination and endorses the work of the charity, which provides microloans to women in West Africa to help them start their own businesses, and further looks forward to these pupils continuing to make a contribution to society throughout their lives.
